summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of the alley in block 7, Denny-Furhman Addition to the City of Seattle, by grading and installing wooden crub on one side of said alley, all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 49917 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improving district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds."
